Entries.Harvey: It's part of the festival tradition to always have a few sets of dancers. #$b# Maru and I will sometimes volunteer if Lewis asks, though I'm not much of a dancer if I'm being honest.$s

Entries.FlowerDance_Decline: Oh! I'm sorry... I, er... would rather not...$s

Entries.Harvey: Please be sure to wear some sunscreen farmer, it's hot out today.

Entries.Wed8: I'm glad to have a job at the clinic... Harvey was so nice for offering me a job.$h

Entries.Maru_Spouse: Harvey keeps trying to talk about work but I think today is a good day for us to just relax.

Entries.Rainy_Day_1: I wonder how Maru is doing working with Dr. Harvey at the clinic? #$b# I hope she's having fun!$h
I wonder how Maru is doing working with Dr. Harvey at the clinic? #$b# I hope she's having fun!$h

Entries.Bad_9: I wonder if I could've done better... Maybe I should have explored other options before rushing into this relationship...$s

Entries.FlowerDance_Accept_Spouse: Oh I was going to skip out this year... $s#$b#Just kidding! Of course I'm dancing with you. I love you.$h

Entries.FlowerDance_Decline: No... I'm not interested in dancing with you.

Entries.Wed2: Sam is probably my only friend in this town.#$e#Well, Abby is nice too, but I don't know her that well...

Entries.dating_Sebastian_memory_oneday: I heard you and Sebastian started dating!#$b#I didn't realize you guys had a thing, you two will be so cute together!$h

Entries.Wed2_inlaw_Abigail: Hope you don't mind Abby still drumming for us.

Entries.Rainy_Day_1: I think I'll hit up Sebastian and Abigail and see if they want to practice again soon.#$e#

Entries.married_Elliott: Elliott's a real great writer... I'm sure your days will be filled with poetry!$h

Entries.choseFarming: pause 500/question fork0 "#The valley's soil is ideal for growing delicious vegetables.#The valley's air and grass are perfect for raising animals."/fork choseAnimals/animate Vincent false true 50 16 17/playSound dwop/pause 300/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 500/stopAnimation Vincent/speak Penny "Yes, Vincent?"/speak Vincent "Um, Farmer @? If I eat your veggies will I grow up strong like my big brother Sam?#$b#He's so strong, I saw him carry @ to doctor Harvey's clinic one night!$h"/showFrame Penny 27/jump Penny/pause 800/showFrame Penny 0/faceDirection farmer 3 true/emote Penny 12/speak Penny "Vincent! It's not good to gossip!$a"/switchEvent fieldTripEnd/

Entries.Alex: Hmm... Do you think dancing counts as cardio?

Entries.married_Haley: You got Haley to marry you, huh? I always figured she was out of our league!

Entries.winter_Tue: You think Haley might know where I could get a new jacket?

Entries.winter_Tue4_inlaw_Haley: I'll admit... I wasn't expecting any of us to get married anytime soon. But, hey... We're growing up!.$9

Entries.winter_Tue4: Haley and I were gonna head to Zuzu together to go shopping today but I think I'm busy$s

Entries.Event_room1: Him? No!#$b#...Well, I guess I used to like his one guy. But not anymore! He's immature.

Entries.summer_Fri: I wonder what Alex is doing today...#$b#Maybe I could get some people together for a beach day!$h

Entries.winter_Sun: Winter is fun! People always ask me where to get the best winter clothes!$h

Entries.winter_Sun6: Alex and I were going to hang out but I'm busy today.

Entries.Event_room1: Him? No!#$b#...Well, I guess I used to like this one guy. But not anymore! He's immature.

Entries.Tue6: Miss Penny gave Jas and I a book to read today. It was really long.$u

Entries.Penny_y2: Jas and Vincent asked me to teach them to dance...#$b# It was sort of embarassing for me but they loved it!$h

Entries.Clint: I wonder if anyone would dance with me...

Entries.Thu6: Clint comes into the saloon almost every night. It's nice having regulars.

Entries.dating_Emily: I... um... heard that you and Emily are together. Congratulations!$h

Entries.married_Emily: Emily seems happier now that you two are married!$h

Entries.divorced_Emily: You better not have hurt Emily's feelings, she's a gem in the rough.$a

Entries.Thu8: I heard Emily has a friend who lives in the desert. Do you know anything about her?

Entries.Fri8: I should save up and buy a computer...#$e#Maybe I can find some friends on the 'internet'...$s#$e#What? Don't judge me! Not everyone is a cool and socially-adept farmer, you know!$u#$e#What's a guy like me supposed to do? *Groan*$s

Entries.eventSeen_101_memory_oneweek: Did Emily say anything about our hangout the other day? It was fun getting out with someone! $h

Entries.fall_Thu8: I wonder how Clint's doing today?#$e#I want to show him a cool rock I found!$h

I mean, I'll have the Big n' Cheesy. With extra sauce, please.$s#$b#...$u"/faceDirection Clint 3/faceDirection Emily 2/pause 300/faceDirection Clint 2/speak Emily "Hi @."/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection Clint 1/speak Clint "Er... *ahem* Th...Thanks, Emily. For... taking my order.#$b#Um, Emily? I was...*gulp*... I was wondering...$h"/pause 300/faceDirection Emily 3/emote Emily 8/pause 400/speak Emily "Yes, Clint?$u"/pause 500/emote Clint 28/pause 1200/speak Clint "... never mind.$s"/faceDirection Clint 0/playMusic sadpiano/pause 300/faceDirection Emily 2/pause 300/faceDirection Emily 3/pause 500/move Emily 0 -1 1/move Emily 1 0 1/faceDirection Shane 3/speak Emily "Hi, Shane! Here's your beverage.$h"/pause 300/faceDirection Shane 1/pause 400/addObject 8 17 346 1/playSound woodyStep/pause 400/faceDirection Shane 3/pause 300/faceDirection Clint 1/speak Shane "Thanks, Emily!$h#$b#So... How's your shift coming along?"/speak Emily "It's fine! Thanks for asking, Shane!$h#$b#Do you have any new chicken stories for me?"/pause 600/emote Clint 28/pause 500/faceDirection Clint 2/pause 800/speak Clint "*sigh*$s#$b#I'm doomed...$s"/end warpOut

Entries.fall_Thu8: I wonder how Clint's doing today?#$e#I want to show him a cool rock I found!$h

I'm scared, but also very pleased.$h"

Entries.Marlon: These old bones ain't much for dancing.

Entries.Mon8: Abigail sometimes takes walks to the Wizard, I'm just glad she doesn't stay out too late.
